name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

name: Molecular Structure and Bonding
description: Fundamentals of organic molecular structure, hybridization, and chemical bonding.

name: Reaction Mechanisms
description: Understanding organic reaction pathways, intermediates, and stereochemistry.

name: Functional Group Chemistry
description: Overview of major functional groups and their reactivity in organic synthesis.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Fundamentals of transition metal complexes, ligand field theory, and coordination bonding.

name: Symmetry and Group Theory
description: Understanding molecular symmetry, point groups, and their applications in inorganic systems.

name: Solid State and Materials Chemistry
description: Overview of crystal structures, bonding in solids, and inorganic materials properties.

name: Thermodynamics and Equilibrium
description: Fundamentals of thermodynamic laws, entropy, Gibbs free energy, and chemical equilibrium.

name: Quantum Mechanics and Spectroscopy
description: Understanding wave functions, atomic orbitals, and spectroscopic techniques in chemical systems.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Overview of reaction rates, rate laws, activation energy, and reaction dynamics.

name: Introduction to Classical Scripts
description: Fundamentals of ancient writing systems including cuneiform, hieroglyphics, and Linear B.

name: Historical Linguistics and Language Evolution
description: Understanding phonological shifts, language families, and the development of ancient tongues over time.

name: Translation and Textual Analysis
description: Overview of methods for deciphering, translating, and interpreting ancient manuscripts and inscriptions.

name: Arcane Theory and Spellcasting
description: Fundamentals of magical theory, mana channeling, and the art of spellcasting for apprentice wizards.

name: Elven Lore and Forest Magic
description: Understanding elven history, nature-based enchantments, and the sacred bond between elves and the natural world.

name: Potion Crafting and Enchantment
description: Overview of alchemical potion brewing, artifact enchantment, and the integration of wizard and elven magical traditions.
